skills: Final accounts, Balance Sheet, QuickBooks, financial statements, accounting cycle, Excel, Microsoft Word, computer skills, accounting, Arabic, bank reconciliations, resolve customer complaints, Customer Service, databases.
summary: I have around 6 years experiences in the field of Accounting & banking works, with Egyptians and foreign companies, I'm really honored to introduce myself as a hardworking, good Communication skill, with the highest level of integrity, honesty, loyalty, strong belief, goal orientated, sober habits and the desire to produce the best of the work.
work_experience: The candidate served as a General Accountant from 08/2010 to 02/2013, where they were responsible for preparing financial and accounting reports, weekly and monthly revenue/expense reports, journal entries, general ledger operations, account/bank reconciliations, expense report review, and assisting with audit processes. Additionally, from 03/2013 to 10/2016, the candidate handled customer service and account management, including direct customer interaction, promptly responding to inquiries, resolving complaints, providing pricing/delivery information, setting up new customer accounts, processing orders/forms/applications, organizing workflow, managing customer accounts, keeping detailed records of interactions and inquiries, and maintaining customer databases. This also included completing customer account openings using the National Bank of Egypt system, ensuring compliance with Egyptian standards, and serving up to 50 branches daily with nearly 500 accounts.
